# serval_team (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# Query by ID
data "serval_team" "example_team_by_id" {
  id = "id"
}

# Query by name (more intuitive)
data "serval_team" "example_team_by_name" {
  name = "Engineering"
}

# Query by prefix
data "serval_team" "example_team_by_prefix" {
  prefix = "ENG"
}
```

## Argument Reference

This data source supports the following arguments:

- `id` (Optional) The ID of the team. Exactly one of `id`, `name`, or `prefix` must be specified.
- `name` (Optional) The name of the team. Exactly one of `id`, `name`, or `prefix` must be specified.
- `prefix` (Optional) The prefix of the team. Exactly one of `id`, `name`, or `prefix` must be specified.

## Attribute Reference

This data source exports the following attributes in addition to the arguments above:

- `id` (String) The ID of the team.
- `name` (String) The name of the team.
- `prefix` (String) The prefix of the team.
- `created_at` (String) Timestamp in RFC 3339 format.
- `description` (String) The description of the team.
- `organization_id` (String) The ID of the organization the team belongs to.
- `user_ids` (List of String) The IDs of users in the team.
